languages.text: {n}Едва затихает запись, как Соломон громко провозглашает:{/n} "Напоминаю, что решение Вольного Торговца по десятине принималось в моем присутствии, и любые обвинения в первую очередь должно предъявлять мне — и мне есть, что ответить".

{n}The recording barely fades out before Solomorne loudly proclaims:{/n} "I remind you that the Rogue Trader's decision regarding the tithe was made in my presence. Therefore, any and all accusations should be levied against me first, and I do have much to say on the matter."
languages.original_text: {n}Едва затихает запись, как Соломон громко провозглашает:{/n} "Напоминаю, что решение Вольного Торговца по десятине принималось в моем присутствии, и любые обвинения в первую очередь должно предъявлять мне — и мне есть, что ответить".

Therefore any and all accusations should be levied against at me first, and I do have a lot to say on the matter."

{n}The recording barely fades out before Solomorne loudly proclaims:{/n} "I remind you that the Rogue Trader's decision regarding the tithe was made in my presence. Therefore any and all accusations should be levied against at me first, and I do have a lot to say on the matter."

{n}The recording barely fades out before Solomorne loudly proclaims:{/n} "I remind you that the Rogue Trader's decision regarding the tithe was made in my presence. Therefore, any and all accusations should be levied against me first, and I do have much to say on the matter."

{n}The recording barely fades out before Solomorne loudly proclaims:{/n} "I remind you that the Rogue Trader's decision regarding the tithe was made in my presence. Therefore, any and all accusations should be levied against me first, and I do have much to say on the matter."

languages.text: {n}Die Aufzeichnung ist noch nicht ganz verklungen, als Solomorne lautstark erklärt:{/n} "Ich weise Euch darauf hin, dass die Entscheidung {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} hinsichtlich des Zehnts in meiner Gegenwart getroffen wurde. Aus diesem Grund sind alle Anschuldigungen zunächst an mich zu richten, und ich habe zu der Angelegenheit nicht viel zu sagen.
languages.original_text: {n}The recording barely fades out before Solomorne loudly proclaims:{/n} "I remind you that the Rogue Trader's decision regarding the tithe was made in my presence. Therefore, any and all accusations should be levied against me first, and I do have much to say on the matter."

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Aufzeichnung ist noch nicht ganz verklungen, als Solomorne lautstark erklärt:{/n} "Ich weise Euch darauf hin, dass die Entscheidung {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} hinsichtlich des Zehnts in meiner Gegenwart getroffen wurde. Aus diesem Grund sind alle Anschuldigungen zunächst an mich zu richten, und ich habe zu der Angelegenheit nicht viel zu sagen.

languages.text: {n}À peine l'enregistrement est-il terminé que Solomorne proclame à voix haute :{/n} « Je vous rappelle que la décision {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} concernant la dîme a été prise en ma présence. Par conséquent, toute accusation doit d'abord être portée contre moi, et il se trouve que j'ai beaucoup à dire à ce sujet. »
languages.original_text: {n}The recording barely fades out before Solomorne loudly proclaims:{/n} "I remind you that the Rogue Trader's decision regarding the tithe was made in my presence. Therefore, any and all accusations should be levied against me first, and I do have much to say on the matter."

traits.locale_text: {n}À peine l'enregistrement est-il terminé que Solomorne proclame à voix haute :{/n} « Je vous rappelle que la décision {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} concernant la dîme a été prise en ma présence. Par conséquent, toute accusation doit d'abord être portée contre moi, et il se trouve que j'ai beaucoup à dire à ce sujet. »

languages.text: {n}录音刚刚结束，索罗蒙就高声宣布道。{/n}“我想提醒你，行商浪人关于什一税的决定是在我面前做出来的，因此所有指控都应该先针对我才行。关于这件事情，我确实有很多话要说。”
languages.original_text: {n}The recording barely fades out before Solomorne loudly proclaims:{/n} "I remind you that the Rogue Trader's decision regarding the tithe was made in my presence. Therefore, any and all accusations should be levied against me first, and I do have much to say on the matter."

traits.locale_text: {n}录音刚刚结束，索罗蒙就高声宣布道。{/n}“我想提醒你，行商浪人关于什一税的决定是在我面前做出来的，因此所有指控都应该先针对我才行。关于这件事情，我确实有很多话要说。”

languages.text: {n}Apenas termina la grabación, Solomorne proclama en voz alta:{/n} «Les recuerdo que la decisión de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente sobre el diezmo se tomó en mi presencia. Por lo tanto, todas las acusaciones al respecto deben realizarse primero contra mí, y tengo mucho que decir sobre este asunto».
languages.original_text: {n}The recording barely fades out before Solomorne loudly proclaims:{/n} "I remind you that the Rogue Trader's decision regarding the tithe was made in my presence. Therefore, any and all accusations should be levied against me first, and I do have much to say on the matter."

traits.locale_text: {n}Apenas termina la grabación, Solomorne proclama en voz alta:{/n} «Les recuerdo que la decisión de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente sobre el diezmo se tomó en mi presencia. Por lo tanto, todas las acusaciones al respecto deben realizarse primero contra mí, y tengo mucho que decir sobre este asunto».

languages.text: {n}録音がほとんど途切れるかと思われた瞬間に、ソロモーンは大声で宣言した。{/n}「ローグトレーダーの租税に関する決定は、私の立ち会いのもとでなされたものであることを、ここに改めて申し上げます。ゆえに、いかなる非難もまず私に向けられるべきです。この件について私には語るべきことが多くあります」
languages.original_text: {n}The recording barely fades out before Solomorne loudly proclaims:{/n} "I remind you that the Rogue Trader's decision regarding the tithe was made in my presence. Therefore, any and all accusations should be levied against me first, and I do have much to say on the matter."

traits.locale_text: {n}録音がほとんど途切れるかと思われた瞬間に、ソロモーンは大声で宣言した。{/n}「ローグトレーダーの租税に関する決定は、私の立ち会いのもとでなされたものであることを、ここに改めて申し上げます。ゆえに、いかなる非難もまず私に向けられるべきです。この件について私には語るべきことが多くあります」

languages.text: {n}Kayıt zar zor sona ererken Solomorne yüksek sesle duyuruyor.{/n} "Size hatırlatmalıyım. Hür Tacir'in aşarla ilgili kararı, huzurumda verilmiştir. Bu nedenle her türlü suçlama, öncelikle bana yöneltilmelidir. Kaldı ki bu konuda söyleyecek çok şeyim var."
languages.original_text: {n}The recording barely fades out before Solomorne loudly proclaims:{/n} "I remind you that the Rogue Trader's decision regarding the tithe was made in my presence. Therefore, any and all accusations should be levied against me first, and I do have much to say on the matter."
